pageProduct.name: Alya Skin Australian Pink Clay Mask 120g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Alya Skin Pink Clay Mask is designed to detoxify and brighten skin.

Warnings

For external use only. Do not use on skin that is irritated, broken or sunburned. If irritation develops, discontinue use immediately. Keep out of reach of children. Not for use by children. Keep out of eyes. In case of contact, rinse with clean water.

Common Uses

Alya Skin Pink Clay Mask is designed to detoxify and brighten skin, as well as tighten skin pores and extract pollutants and nasties. It will also assist in the removal of acne and pimples. Safe for sensitive skin types. Vegan, animal cruelty free.

Ingredients

Kaolin, Aqua, Bentonite, Limonene, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Witch Hazel, Aloe Vera, Lactic Acid, Pomegranate Fruit Extract, Isododecane, Propylene Glycol, Gylceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Glyceryl Stearate, Melia Azadirachta Seed Oil, Rosemary, Vitamin E, Polysorbate 80, Retinyl Palmitate, Vitamin C, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Methylparaben, CI 77491

Directions

Spread mask evenly on clean skin. Sit back and relax for 10 minutes. Remove clay mask with warm wet towel. Use moisturising cream after mask application.
